document_data.name: Kothont Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Kothont Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Kothont]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the west section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] at the intersection of [[Delzorin Street]] and [[Shield Street]] at the border with the [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. The east side of the villa also sat along [[Copper Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: Four separate buildings composed the walled villa compound. Gardens and courtyards lay between each building. The buildings were one or two stories tall.
